content: Open daily, except Thu and Sun, from 13:00
Please enter between 14:00 and 14:30 to be seated before the main show (14:30â€“17:00) and enjoy the pre-show entertainment (music, pole dance, etc.)
Enjoy food and drinks before and after the show, until 17:30
We will not make a refund for any reason. Excluding a schedule change, cancellation of the performance on our end, or any technical issues.
Alcohol will only be served to ages 20+ (the legal drinking age in Japan)
Choose the [Advance Booking] option at least 1 day in advance to order a bento; same-day bookings can choose from ramen, udon, or drinks
Seats are assigned as guests arrive, so come early for the best view
